item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: BTI (British American Tobacco p.l.c.) Middle British American Tobacco plc faces potential challenges from California’s ban on flavored tobacco products, but may find stability in the Supreme Court’s decision and opportunities in the comeback and dividend stocks for potential growth and resilience in the market.
